pages.title: 关于
pages.text: 关于本人，非 Geek，也不懂代码，只是比较喜欢折腾。 关于本站，也是心血来潮无聊搭建来玩的，目前并无实质内容。 因此本站将长期处于测试阶段……

pages.title: 观影记录
pages.text: 请输入密码： Incorrect Password! No content to display! 

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.title: 建站日志
posts.text: 闲来无事心血来潮搭建了这个博客，用的是 Hexo + GitHub 的方法。作为小白，完全依靠网上的教程操作完成，过程不算太复杂，其实还挺有趣。 在页面效果上，虽说自定义程度高，但由于不具备代码相关知识，对于一些想修改的地方只能慢慢琢磨和尝试，并依旧是借助网络的力量。 不过说到底，我也并没有什么东西可写，至少目前没有，所以这博客空荡荡如你所见，但对主题的小修小改却又莫名感兴趣，以致于最后似乎重点和乐趣不在写内容上，全在折腾主题上了。 所以本站将长期处于测试和优化阶段…… function siteTime(){ window.setTimeout("siteTime()", 1000); var seconds = 1000 var minutes = seconds * 60 var hours = minutes * 60 var days = hours * 24 var years = days * 365 var today = new Date() var todayYear = today.getFullYear() var todayMonth = today.getMonth() var todayDate = today.getDate() var todayHour = today.getHours() var todayMinute = today.getMinutes() var todaySecond = today.getSeconds() var t1 = Date.UTC(2018,03,17,16,05,23) //Since 2018-04-17 var t2 = Date.UTC(todayYear,todayMonth,todayDate,todayHour,todayMinute,todaySecond) var diff = t2-t1 var diffYears = Math.floor(diff/years) var diffDays = Math.floor((diff/days)-diffYears*365) var diffHours = Math.floor((diff-(diffYears*365+diffDays)*days)/hours) var diffMinutes = Math.floor((diff-(diffYears*365+diffDays)*days-diffHours*hours)/minutes) var diffSeconds = Math.floor((diff-(diffYears*365+diffDays)*days-diffHours*hours-diffMinutes*minutes)/seconds) document.getElementById("sitetime").innerHTML=" 本站已运行 "+diffYears+" 年 "+diffDays+" 天 "+diffHours+" 小时 "+diffMinutes+" 分 "+diffSeconds+" 秒 " } siteTime() 2020-01增加夜间模式和首页轮播图Beta 2019-07升级主题至 Icarus v2自定义修改部分页面效果 2018-05更换主题为 Icarus 2018-04-17建站，选用主题 Material
